title: Is It So Good That It Is Clouding My Judgment
itunes:title: Is It So Good That It Is Clouding My Judgment
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I am a 43 year old single mom of two. For the past year, I have been seeing a nice 43 year old gentleman that I've met on the Plenty Of Fish dating site. When we met, I told him that I was ready for a relationship not just to hook up for sex. He said let's see where it goes. Two weeks later after talking on the phone we finally met up and we ended up having sex that first night. Darn it Steve, it was so good that I could not stop. We continued to have sex at least once a week and he started staying overnight at my house.......

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
